results.title: Metformin attenuated the autoimmune disease of the central nervous system in animal models of multiple sclerosis.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ attenuated the @<m>DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases_of_the_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020274 @@@autoimmune disease of the central nervous system@@@ in animal models of @DISEASE_Multiple_Sclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D009103 @@@multiple sclerosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Nath N, Khan M, Paintlia MK, Singh I, Hoda MN, Giri S. Metformin attenuated the autoimmune disease of the central nervous system in animal models of multiple sclerosis. J Immunol. 2009 Jun 15;182(12):8005-14. PMID: 19494326
citations.BibTeX: @article{19494326, title={Metformin attenuated the autoimmune disease of the central nervous system in animal models of multiple sclerosis.}, author={Nath N and Khan M and Paintlia MK and Singh I and Hoda MN and Giri S}, journal={J Immunol}, volume={182}, number={12}, pages={8005-14}}

results.title: Metformin and Autoimmunity: A "New Deal" of an Old Drug
results.text_hl: Studies suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ interferes with key immunopathological mechanisms involved in @<m>DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases_of_the_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020274 @@@systemic autoimmune diseases@@@, such as the T helper 17/regulatory T cell balance, germinal centers formation, autoantibodies production, macrophage polarization, cytokine synthesis, neutrophil extracellular traps release, and bone or extracellular matrix remodeling.

citations.NLM: Ursini F, Russo E, Pellino G, D'Angelo S, Chiaravalloti A, De Sarro G, Manfredini R, De Giorgio R. Metformin and Autoimmunity: A "New Deal" of an Old Drug Front Immunol. 2018;9():1236. PMID: 29915588
citations.BibTeX: @article{29915588, title={Metformin and Autoimmunity: A "New Deal" of an Old Drug}, author={Ursini F and Russo E and Pellino G and D'Angelo S and Chiaravalloti A and De Sarro G and Manfredini R and De Giorgio R}, journal={Front Immunol}, volume={9}, pages={1236}}
